thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Glen Mollett

author: Glen Mollett
title: Glen Mollett
text: Thank you for your quick reaction to my problem Spencer, VERY impressed mate... I urgently contacted you with a challenge, you got straight on it and solved it inn what i can ony believe to be record time!!!! most grateful to you... Seems that your whole team there have this ability to solve issues with great haste! deepest thanks... sincerest gratitude to you... Glen
